author: Unreal Engine
description:
‘Rematch’ is a football game that lets you control one player at a time as you compete alongside your teammates in fast-paced matches from an immersive third-person perspective. 

Watch this video for an insight into how Sloclap leveraged UE5 features such as Virtual Shadow Maps and Temporal Super Resolution to reimagine football in an original way.

To get the full story, check out our interview with Sloclap: https://epic.gm/dev-interviews-rematch

#Sloclap #Rematch, #UnrealEngine5, #UE5, #UE4
title: Rematch | Game Profile | Unreal Engine
